rooms.description: This space serves as the welcoming area with a vestibule for wheelchair accessibility. It includes an automatic door system and low-level thresholds to comply with building norms and ensure easy navigation.
A combined living and dining space with an open-plan design for natural light. Features include a wheelchair-accessible pathway and adjustable furniture to accommodate movement.
A modern kitchen layout designed with accessibility in mind. Appliances are installed at accessible heights and the countertop design is compliant with local building codes.
A dedicated gym area with accessible equipment and ample space for movement. The design includes smooth floors and non-slip surfaces to support wheelchair users.
A modest living area for the servants with essential amenities. The design ensures privacy while maintaining accessibility standards.
A utility space for washing, drying, and storage. The design includes wheelchair-accessible features and complies with local norms.
A wheelchair-accessible bathroom with a roll-in shower and grab bars. Designed following local building codes for accessibility.
A secondary toilet facility designed for guests. Features include accessibility measures and compliance with local norms.
A storage area for household supplies and appliances. The design includes built-in shelves and is accessible to all family members.

openings.description: A wheelchair-accessible door with an automatic opening system to ensure smooth entry.
Large windows installed for natural light and ventilation. The design ensures compliance with local building norms.
Windows designed to allow proper ventilation in the kitchen area while maintaining privacy.
A skylight integrated into the gym ceiling for natural lighting and improved air circulation.
A door providing access to the utility area from an outdoor balcony for easier maintenance and ventilation.

rooms.description: The master bedroom is spacious with built-in accessibility features such as a wider door and accessible furniture. A private balcony overlooks the garden area to maintain privacy.
A guest bedroom with a wheelchair-accessible design. It features lower counters and accessible shelving.
A dedicated workspace designed for comfort and accessibility with adjustable seating and desk height. It includes built-in storage solutions.
A flexible space that can serve as an extra bedroom or storage. Designed with accessibility in mind and following Vastu principles.
A family bathroom on the first floor with wheelchair-accessible fixtures. Designed according to local building standards and Vastu.
A compact storage area designed to accommodate seasonal items and extra furniture while ensuring easy access.

openings.description: A wheelchair-accessible staircase with a ramp alternative to ensure safe and easy access between floors.
Doors leading to the balcony area on the first floor for fresh air and relaxation.

notes.wheelchair_accessibility: All entrances, corridors, and essential facilities are designed to be wheelchair accessible with ramps, automatic doors, and low thresholds.
notes.vastu_compliance: The floor plan is oriented according to Vastu principles ensuring energy flow, privacy, and harmony.
notes.building_norms: Design complies with local building codes including fire safety, ventilation, and accessibility norms.
